code: @Test public void testCauseIsSerialized() throws Exception {     // Tests that the cause is stringified, because it might be an instance     // of a user level Exception, which can not be deserialized by the     // remote receiver's system class loader.     ProducerFailedException e = new ProducerFailedException(new Exception()).     assertNotNull(e.getCause()).     assertTrue(e.getCause() instanceof SerializedThrowable). }
